# ILogger interface

Defines a set of methods for logging information, warnings, and errors.

```csharp
public interface ILogger
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [LogError](ILogger/LogError.md)(…) | Logs an error message. |
| [LogInformation](ILogger/LogInformation.md)(…) | Logs an informational message. |
| [LogWarning](ILogger/LogWarning.md)(…) | Logs a warning message. |
